trans-unit.source: Provides functionality for 3-D models.
Objects of this type include <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Light>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3DGroup>.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D> class to render <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D> objects.
You can compose <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D> objects by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3DGroup> to form a single model.
You can share <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D> objects among <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D> objects to make multiple instances in a scene.
Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D"></xref> that specifies the axis-aligned bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D"></xref> bounding box for the model.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D"></xref>, and makes deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects or of any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D"></xref> object, and makes deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied; however, their current values are copied.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects or of any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
Creates a string representation of the Model3D.
A string representation of the object.
Creates a string representation of the Model3D.
Culture-specific formatting information.
A string representation of the Model3D.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> set on the model.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> set on the model.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Model3D.Transform"></xref> dependency property.
Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
The format to use.
-or-
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref href="System.IFormattable"></xref> implementation.
The provider to use to format the value.
-or-
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
The value of the current instance in the specified format.
